template: Uy! Musta? >> May kwento ka bang gusto i-share? Tara usap tayo.>> O gusto mo makinig ng mga music? >> Or baka gusto mo manood ng inspirational videos?
May kwento ka bang gusto i-share? Tara usap tayo.>> Gusto mo makinig ng mga music? >> O gusto mo manood ng inspirational videos?
So, may kwento ka pa bang gusto i-share o pag usapan?? >> Gusto mo pa makinig ng mga music? >> Or baka gusto mo pa manood ng inspirational videos?
Ah sige, anong gusto mo pag usapan? >> puwede mo yan ishare saken
Happy ako na naishare mo yan sakin. >> Minsan talaga magandang may nakakausap ka. >> kase keme keme keme
Marami akong music dito >> pili ka lang >> makakahelp to sa mood mo
Marami akong videos dito para sayo>> sabi nila nakakahelp daw to boost mood. >> pili ka
So kamusta ang pakikinig? >> Did you feel better or still the same mood?
So kamusta ang panunuod? >> Did you feel better or still the same mood?
Buti naman kung ganun >> May kwento ka pa bang gusto i-share? Tara usap tayo. >> Gusto mo makinig ng mga music? >> O gusto mo manood ng inspirational videos?
I am glad you talked to me >> You always have me >> Just drop a message anytime!
Got it. Later then >> Just chat me whenever you are free my friend
Chat you soon. I had a great time talking to you.
Thanks for the time, i enjoyed chatting with you.
Its nice talking to you. Till next time my friend.
